ygData.subject: See no evil...Hear no evil...Speak no evil...
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, this is Alhassim signing off... After reading the last couple of subtle brush off posts regarding lets work with what we have ..etc  I will no longer
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, this is Alhassim signing off...

After reading the last couple of subtle brush off posts regarding "lets work with what we have ..etc" I will no longer be posting to this list. (And the villagers rejoice..)

I still find it unbelievable at how complacent you "seekers of knowledge" are and at how many of the repetitive posts on this list concern "where can I find this spell or item" when the reader could just go back and read the archive to find his/her answer.

Anyway, my hats off to the people who suggested the Teleport Others/Tap Affinity type spells, that was the only thing I read that was worthwhile on this list.

Bye
